name: VAAppointment
description: An Appointment profiled to support VA requirements.

element.label: STATUS
element.definition: This field contains the current status of the patient's appointment.  If the field is blank, it means the appointment has not been no-showed or cancelled and the patient was not an inpatient at the time of the appointment.  This field is set automatically by the scheduling module and must NOT be edited.

element.label: APPOINTMENT DATE/TIME
element.definition: This displays date/time function as defined in file manager.  The date/time of the appointment. |
